description:
### Note: Open Source ELK Stack does not work with agents that are based on Elastic Paid License. The apache 2.0 license (OSS) packages are limited in what it can support with ELK.

## Winlogbeat - OSS is open-source, based on Apache2.0 License which is for open source ELK Stack.

Winlogbeat Keeps a pulse on what's happening across your Windows-based infrastructure. Stream Windows event logs to Elasticsearch and Logstash with Winlogbeat. 

Winlogbeat supports Elastic Common Schema (ECS) and is part of the Elastic Stack, meaning it works seamlessly with Logstash, Elasticsearch, and Kibana. Whether you want to apply a bit more transformation muscle to Windows event logs with Logstash, fiddle with some analytics in Elasticsearch, or review data in Kibana on a dashboard or in the SIEM app, Winlogbeat makes it easy.
summary: Winlogbeat-OSS application is a free based on Apache2.0 license and intended for legacy open-source of logstash and elasticsearch servers. Winlogbeat-OSS is Lightweight data shipper for Windows event logs. They can send windows event logs data from hundreds or thousands of machines and systems to Logstash or Elasticsearch.
author: ElasticSearch
